processor.name: pll
processor.description: Used for resolving pricelist from name to ID

configdata.Program: CREATE PROCEDURE PriceListLookup @pricelist NVARCHAR(255),@resolved_pricelist INTEGER OUTPUT AS SELECT t_pricelist.id_pricelist INTO @resolved_pricelist FROM t_pricelist JOIN t_vw_base_props ON t_vw_base_props.id_prop = t_pricelist.id_pricelist AND t_vw_base_props.id_lang_code = 840 AND t_vw_base_props.n_kind = 150 WHERE UPPER(t_vw_base_props.nm_name)=UPPER(@pricelist)
